notes: Magpie is a suite of scripts for running big data software on traditional HPC systems.
The script is designed for use with LSF but can be adapted for other schedulers.
Magpie requires passwordless SSH access to all nodes in the cluster.
The script configures environment variables and launches daemons for Hadoop, Spark, and Tachyon.
It allows users to customize the configuration and execution of these software packages.
